front.title: Recommendation for random number generation using deterministic random bit generators

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Recommendation specifies mechanisms for the generation of random bits using deterministic methods. The methods provided are based on either cryptographic hash functions, block cipher algorithms or number theoretic problems.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
